original: Kylander, Bertil Josef Torgny, redaktör, Göteborg, f. 25/8/01 i Gbg av Axel K. o. Hedvig Hansson. G. 45 m. So nia Andersohn. — Medarb. i Gbgs Morgonpost 23-26, i Gbgs-Posten 26-30, sportred. i Gbgs Morgonpost 36-38. Manager i prof. boxn. för bl. a. Gunnar Andersson o. Gunnar Bärlund. Tililh. Örgryte IS, stift, av Redbergs-lid(s IK (numera hed :led.) o. Redbergs- lids boxn:klubb, styr:led. i £1. per., styr :led. v. ol. tidlf. i Idr :ringen, Fot-b.-trusten, Gbg-s fotb:förb., Idr. vänner. Sign.: Kylix, Mac Lean, Mr Knox m. fl.
translated: Kylander, Bertil Josef Torgny, editor, Gothenburg, b. 25/8/01 in Gothenburg to Axel K. and Hedvig Hansson. Married in '45 to Sonia Andersohn. - Collaborator in Gbgs Morgonpost '23-'26, in Gbgs-Posten '26-'30, sports editor in Gbgs Morgonpost '36-'38. Manager in professional boxing for, among others, Gunnar Andersson and Gunnar Bärlund. Belongs to Örgryte IS, member of the board of Redbergs-lid's IK (now honorary member) and Redbergs-lids boxing club, board member of £1. per., former board member of Idr:ringen, Fotb.-trusten, Gbg-s fotb-förb., Idr. vänner. Signature: Kylix, Mac Lean, Mr Knox, and others.
